sen.e: His Sotomago (grandchild from a daughter married into another family), MINAMOTO no Kishi (Motoko) that his daughter who had married into MINAMOTO no Motohira gave birth to was in favor with Emperor Gosanjo, and MINAMOTO no Kishi had Imperial Prince Sanehito (Heian period) and Imperial Prince Sukehito with the emperor Gosanjo; and they were strong candidates to succeed the imperial throne at one time.
